}} 'Gliquidone' (INN, sold under the trade name 'Glurenorm') is an anti-
diabetic drug in the sulfonylurea class. It is used in the treatment of
diabetes mellitus type 2. It is marketed by the pharmaceutical company
Boehriger Ingelheim, Germany.
